name: testScopeAdmin_AppointmentVisibility
description: UI: admin worker create appointment ->login as junior worker and verify invisibility of appointment ->login as readonly worker and verify invisibility of appointment
descriptionHtml: UI: admin worker create appointment ->login as junior worker and verify invisibility of appointment ->login as readonly worker and verify invisibility of appointment

testStage.description: UI: admin worker create appointment ->login as junior worker and verify invisibility of appointment ->login as readonly worker and verify invisibility of appointment

steps.name: Preconditions: change calendar view -> create client & service -> create appointment -> delete appointment
matcher: extract value from response HTML

parameters.name: response

steps.name: API: delete all appointments in day of test

parameters.name: client
parameters.value: ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=qNpiBXQAos, permitAds=true, birthdate=09-14, birthyear=1971, address=777 Ortiz Turnpike, South Jazminville, WA 09464, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-22 14:30:50","desc":"uEhmUqc0nU","sum":1460643948}], phone=["0502-47-75-36"], email=courtney.collier@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-22 14:30:50","text":"BrbQCKgkaW"}], name=Booker Hammes II, gender=female)

parameters.name: simpleService
parameters.value: ServiceCreateRequest(serviceID=667530055, serviceName=Derek Quitzon_339-228-1480_2023-05-22, serviceDuration=50, price=46, color=akoSVksHS1, categoryID=764337948, added=2023-05-22 14:30:50, category=ServiceCreateRequest.CategoryRequestCreate(categoryName=MRROhW8ihH, id=L3tysitqKK))

steps.name: API: get Service HTML and convert to Service POJO class
